mentions.context: The BabyLogger also performs on-the-fly encryption, protecting the privacy of the participants in case the device is lost or stolen.
That is why we introduced the Seshat software (Titeux et al., 2020).
One interesting alternative that has been specifically designed for child data acquisition is the BabyLogger (Cao et al., 2018), using an array of four microphones, as opposed to one for LENA.
